meanings.definition: The act of stopping or halting.
meanings.sent1: The stoping of the car was sudden and unexpected.
meanings.sent2: The stoping of the music made everyone look around.
meanings.sent3: I tried to do a dance move, but the stoping of my foot made me lose balance.
meanings.sent4: The stoping of the rain brought out a rainbow in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The stoping of the clock signaled the end of the game.

meanings.definition: A method of mining in which ore is extracted by removing overlying rock.
meanings.sent1: The miners used stoping to extract valuable minerals from the earth.
meanings.sent2: Stoping is a common technique used in underground mining operations.
meanings.sent3: The stoping of the rocks revealed a rich vein of gold underneath.
meanings.sent4: The stoping of the soil exposed layers of different colored rocks.
meanings.sent5: The stoping of the mountain revealed hidden caves and tunnels.
